Package org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font

Class DocsPDType1Font

java.lang.Object
org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDFont
org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDSimpleFont
org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.DocsPDType1Font
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.common.COSObjectable, org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDFontLike
public class DocsPDType1Font extends org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDSimpleFont
Safe non-crashing font even if no glyph are present. Will replace unknown glyphs by a space.
Author:
bgamard
